title: Can i even patch league on my mac?
body:
I have a 2007 macbook with these specs:
Graphics  Intel GMA 950 64 MB
  Processor Name:	Intel Core 2 Duo
  Processor Speed:	2.16 GHz
  Number of Processors:	1
  Total Number of Cores:	2
  L2 Cache:	4 MB
  Memory:	3 GB
13.3-inch (1280 x 800)
can i even download the game and play it?

replies.body:
It depends on which version of macOS you're running. The oldest version we support is 10.7.5 Lion, as listed in our [minimum specs guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/#section-mac).

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^

i do have mac os x lion 10.7.5, yet every time I try to instal the game it always stops at 77% or something and crashes without giving me a warning. It only tells me it crashed when I close it or try and repair it... Can you help me?

Issues at this point in patching are caused by your patcher losing its connection to our patching servers. This is commonly caused by specific network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) to get your settings up to spec.

Let me know if this helped!

i have no idea what the hextech repair tool is doing, it only shows a sliver of it on the top of my screen and i can't pull it down for some reason. and i don't know if im supposed to run it while league is trying to install... its a pain{{item:3070}}
Don't worry about the Hextech Repair Tool for now, I'd suggest focusing on the other steps in the guide for now.
i've tried everything that i can do, yet there is always a bugsplat

Ah, you didn't previously mention a bugplsat. These are actually an entirely different issue and are influenced by hardware or driver issues. Common solutions for this can be found in our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac), so working through those specific steps would be my recommendation.

Please let me know what happens after taking those steps.

everything seems fine, but every time i do the repair thing it doesnt seem to repair anything just the bugsplat notive, and i dont know if my graphics card is better than the minimum, and the screen resolution is only (1280 x 800)
So you're still seeing Bugsplats happen during patching?
it only happens when i close the launcher or repair it most times, or else it usually freezes at about 70%-99%

Gotcha. I feel at this point, we should escalate this to our tech team so we can dive into your system logs to find out what is specifically causing these issues. I recommend grabbing some system logs with our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
well i've tried for awhile and im just gonna give up and not play league on this mac
